event module¶

class event.Event(event_duration, event_cause, event_type, source, destination, obj=None, sent_time=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Defines the basic structure of an event

__init__(event_duration, event_cause, event_type, source, destination, obj=None, sent_time=None)[source]¶

Creates an event. :param event_duration: time at which the event should be scheduled :param event_type: type of event :param event_cause: id of the event that caused this event :param destination: destination module that should be notified :param source: module generating the event :param obj: optional object to be attached to the event

property destination¶

Returns event destination

property event_cause¶

Returns event type

event_counter = 0¶
property event_duration¶

Returns event time

property event_type¶

Returns event type

property id¶

Returns the event id

property obj¶

Returns the object attached to the event

property sent_time¶

Returns the sent time of the event if present

property source¶

Returns event generator
